source: Credit rating based on S&P, Moody’s.
note: Numerical rating is obtained using the ratings scale in Jensen (2022) and as a simple average across ratings.

source: DSA ratings are from the IMF and World Bank Debt Sustainability Analysis (DSA).
note: DSA ratings are from the latest published DSAs as per November 30, 2023.

graph: Government debt as a percentage of GDP
source: Based on data from the IMF World Economic Outlook, April 2024

note: Bilateral and multilateral debt equals total official creditor debt. Bonds plus ‘other private’ equals total private creditor debt.

source: Based on IMF World Economic Outlook, April 2024
note: Net interests are calculated as the difference between the overall and primary balance.

source: Based on IMF World Economic Outlook, April 2024 and World Bank International Debts Statistics 2023 (www.tradingeconomics.com).
note: Total debt servicing covers interest plus principal payments.
